This game is a very good competitive experience if you have prime. if you do not it is filled with free to play hackers. the biggest problem about this game is its garbage anti cheat. even with prime you still get hackers because there are multiple work arounds to not get banned although the trust factor helps filter some out. once i reached lem there was not a single game i was in where there wasnt someone who was hacking.
